title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 2.2 - Promulgation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 2.2 - Promulgation

State Regulations
(a) Regulations shall be promulgated in compliance with the provisions of the State Administrative Procedure Act and other applicable law. (b) Copies of regulations should be sent to all authorized insurers affected thereby, and regulations governing the conduct of agents, brokers and other persons directly affected thereby should be given appropriate publicity or be communicated to such persons by such means as may be deemed convenient and practicable. Notes

2.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
